name: Baldi new schoolhouse 2 (Baldi's basic custom map)
name_original: Baldi new schoolhouse 2 (Baldi's basic custom map)
description:
Welcome to another Baldi brand new schoolhouse. This time Baldi has more ways to play with you. Now go and have fun collecting all 8 notebooks.

If you found any bugs and glitch in this custom map especially the random events, tell me in the comments so I can fix it.

Credits:

Paulor94 - Map creator

mystman12 - Original creator of Baldi's basic

Filename3 - Some inspiration for Vending machine change event
